prompt: Design a forgot password screen with green nature-inspired theme and light green background. Use Column layout with crossAxisAlignment.stretch. Display dark green 'Forgot Password' title, font size 30, bold. Add medium green subtitle saying 'Enter your email to reset your password.' Include TextField with green border, 'Email Address' hint text, and green email prefix icon. Add full-width ElevatedButton with green background, white 'Send Reset Link' text, and rounded corners. Place green 'Back to Login' TextButton below. Use 28px padding and 20px spacing between elements.
